org_name: WESTSIDE COMMUNITY SERVICES SERVICES FOR CHILDREN AND YOUTH
description: Westside Community Services has been providing an array of community-based prevention, mental health, substance abuse, and social services to clients in the City and County of San Francisco for 40 years. Incorporated in 1967, Westside is one of the oldest community-based mental health agencies in the nation. The range of programs and services has varied over the years, while a commitment to providing excellent, high-quality, culturally and community appropriate programs has remained central to the core of the organization. www.westside-health.org

keys: Substance Abuse Prevention, Education, and Intervention
Sliding scale. We accept MediCal, private insurance, Healthy Families, Healthy Kids
Youth up to 24 years of age who are exhibiting emotional problems and are at risk of developing more serious problems such as mental illness and substance abuse
